title: Shadow Fire Kindred E sound wont go off
body: When i used Kindreds e mounting dread on the shadowfire skin the sound wouldn't go off. It would work sometimes then it would stop working

replies.body:
Hiya! 

Thanks for the report! Which sound are you referring to? The active, or Wolf attacking the enemy target?

I am referring to wolf attacking the enemy target and i am very sorry for the late respond i lost the bug report i did and i was struggling to find, but yea when i get the 3rd auto off on kindred sometimes wolf attacking the enemy target wont make any sound and its not my sounds because i had it on full blast and everything but wolf attacking the target worked

Haha, no worries! :)

Lemme talk to an audio engineer and we can see what's happening!
